001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.order;
003
004import java.util.List;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Address;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields;
008
009public interface DeliveryMixin {
010    public Address getAddress();
011
012    public List<DeliveryItem> getItems();
013
014    public List<Parcel> getParcels();
015
016    public CustomFields getCustom();
017
018    public default DeliveryDraftBuilder toDraftBuilder() {
019        return DeliveryDraft.builder()
020                .address(this.getAddress().toDraft())
021                .items(this.getItems())
022                .parcels(this.getParcels().stream().map(Parcel::toDraft).collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toList()))
023                .custom(this.getCustom().toDraft());
024    }
025
026    public default DeliveryDraft toDraft() {
027        return toDraftBuilder().build();
028    }
029}
